text: @HouseGOP Dear GOP: Your Afghanistan and Iraq wars, Great Recession, trillion $ tax cuts, and coronavirus depression have bankrupted the U.S.  Your undying support of a corrupt president divides us as a nation. So exactly what is it that we should fear from a democratic administration?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
